topic.title: The.Forbidden.Room.2015.Bluray.1080p.DTS-HD.x264-Grym
topic.body:
The Forbidden Room (2015)
In this non-linear amalgamation, submarine crewmen and a woodsman wend their way through a voyage of odd experiences.

topic.title: Red Giant - Shooter Suite 13 (v13.0.4)
topic.body:
Red Giant Shooter Suite gives you the freedom to shoot the way you want, with the confidence that your footage will make it from your camera to the editing timeline safe, sound and in sync. Shooter Suite includes BulletProof, a complete on-set backup and review solution that quickly takes you from offload through export. Fast, automatic audio syncing with PluralEyes 4.0 eliminates the need for clappers and time code that come with multi-cam shooting. Shooter Suite also includes LUT Buddy for sharing color decisions made on set, Instant 4K for up-converting, and Frames for deinterlacing to integrate the footage you just shot with older video formats on your timeline.



Red Giant Shooter Suite includes:

    Frames 1.1
    Instant 4K
    Offload 1.0
    PluralEyes 4.0
